author: Spunky Ambassador

commands.description: Call this command to start the Rich Presence service
commands.name: Initialize Rich Presence

defaultParameters.description: The custom status message to display
defaultParameters.name: message

commands.description: Manually trigger an update of the Rich Presence
commands.name: Update Rich Presence

commands.description: Clear the current Rich Presence status
commands.name: Clear Rich Presence

defaultParameters.description: Replace with your Discord App ID
defaultParameters.name: DISCORD_CLIENT_ID

defaultParameters.description: Key for the large image asset
defaultParameters.name: LARGE_IMAGE_KEY

defaultParameters.description: Key for the small image asset
defaultParameters.name: SMALL_IMAGE_KEY

description: This plugin integrates Discord Rich Presence into RPG Paper Maker. It displays your current map/location and a custom status on your Discord profile, with optional elapsed playtime.
name: DiscordRichPresence

parameters.description: Replace with your Discord App ID
parameters.name: DISCORD_CLIENT_ID

parameters.description: Key for the large image asset
parameters.name: LARGE_IMAGE_KEY

parameters.description: Key for the small image asset
parameters.name: SMALL_IMAGE_KEY
